questions.skill_area: Describe fundamental principles of machine learning on Azure
questions.question: Discuss the differences between supervised and unsupervised learning, including typical use cases for each within Azure Machine Learning.
scoring_criteria: Define supervised learning and its reliance on labeled data.
Define unsupervised learning and its use of unlabeled data.
Describe typical algorithms or tasks (e.g., classification/regression for supervised, clustering for unsupervised).
Explain when to use each approach in practical scenarios.
Provide at least one Azure ML example or service for each type.

questions.question: Explain the role of Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) within Azure Machine Learning, and describe the main benefits it offers to data scientists and business users.
scoring_criteria: Define what Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) is.
Describe how AutoML simplifies model selection and tuning.
List supported tasks (classification, regression, time series forecasting).
Explain how AutoML benefits users with limited ML expertise.
Mention integration with Azure ML Studio or Designer for streamlined workflows.
